collectionProcessors.name: Filter_to_eliminate_Signed_Retainer_docs
collectionProcessors.label: Filter to eliminate Signed Retainer docs

collectionProcessors.name: Filter_to_Signed_Retainer_docs_only
collectionProcessors.label: Filter to Signed Retainer docs only

decisions.description: If there is already a value in the Matter field on the Intake, then it has already been converted. If that's the case, we will jump straight to the email-composing component.
decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Was_this_Intake_already_converted
decisions.label: Copy 1 of Was this Intake already converted?

decisions.description: If we already sent them the Intake via API, we do NOT need to send them an email and can end the flow.
decisions.name: Do_we_need_to_send_a_referral_email_to_the_Campaign_Partner
decisions.label: Do we need to send a referral email to the Campaign Partner?

rules.name: Do_NOT_need_to_send_email
rules.label: Do NOT need to send email

decisions.description: If the Campaign Partner uses a custom API (aka Delivery_Flow_Name__c != ''), we will run the flow that calls it instead of sending a referral email.
decisions.name: Does_this_Campaign_Partner_have_a_custom_API
decisions.label: Does this Campaign Partner have a custom API?

decisions.description: If the Email Template field is not null on the Campaign Partner record, we use that Template. Otherwise, we use a default Template.
decisions.name: Does_this_Campaign_Partner_have_a_its_own_Email_Template
decisions.label: Does this Campaign Partner have a its own Email Template?

decisions.description: Checking to make sure the intake is already qualified.
decisions.name: Is_this_Intake_Qualified
decisions.label: Is this Intake Qualified?

decisions.description: If there is already a value in the Matter field on the Intake, then it has already been converted. If that's the case, we will jump straight to the email-composing component.
decisions.name: Was_this_Intake_already_converted
decisions.label: Was this Intake already converted?

Flow.description: RE 06/12/2025 - Added a decision tree "Is Disqualified" check with different updates. CS 06092025 - Update to decision node for sending email to include new Tekmir Apex flow name CS 06062025 - Updates to use new custom apex for Tekmir PFAS Updates to email flow Added update to set Referred Out User, so API Error notifications can be sent to them. DR - 7/17/24 - Updated from email to use custom setting in Automated Comm Settings MC - 8/13 - including referred out sub-status for new filters.

formulas.name: fx_Subject
formulas.expression: 'Referral from Saddle Rock Legal Group LLC'&' | '&{!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.Name}&' | '&{!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name}

Flow.label: BRIO | 'Send Referral' Open Matter

recordLookups.name: Get_File_Info_recs_related_to_this_Intake
recordLookups.label: Get File Info recs related to this Intake

fields.name: InconsistentDataError
fields.fieldText: THIS INTAKE CANNOT BE REFERRED OUT AT THIS TIME BECAUSE:

fields.name: InconsistentDataInstructions
fields.fieldText: Please address this data inconsistency and re-send.

fields.name: SendEmailScreen
fields.fieldText: Send Email to {!Get_Intake_ID.Campaign_Partner__r.Partner__r.Name}.

fields.name: SendEmailWarningScreen
fields.fieldText: NOTE: In order to send the email, you must click the 'Send' button above. Closing the flow before clicking 'Send' will end the flow without sending the email.

fields.name: OpenMatterError
fields.fieldText:
{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please correct the error in order to continue the flow.

fields.name: ExternalLinkError
fields.fieldText:
{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please correct the error in order to continue the flow.

fields.name: Explain_Screen
fields.fieldText: You are converting this Intake to a Matter for referral.

fields.name: SelectQuestionnaire
fields.fieldText: Select the SLRG Questionnaire Output document you want to send to {!Get_Intake_ID.Campaign_Partner__r.Partner__r.Name}.

fields.name: SelectRetainerDT
fields.fieldText: Select the Retainer document you want to send to {!Get_Intake_ID.Campaign_Partner__r.Partner__r.Name}.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_SendEmailScreen
fields.fieldText: Send Email to {!Get_Intake_ID.Campaign_Partner__r.Partner__r.Name}.

fields.name: CloseScreenWarning
fields.fieldText: NOTE: In order to send the email, you must click the 'Send' button above. Closing the flow before clicking 'Send' will end the flow without sending the email.

fields.name: confirm_sent_to_ref_partner
fields.fieldText: This Intake has successfully been sent to {!Get_Intake_ID.Campaign_Partner__r.Partner__r.Name}.

subflows.name: PROD_BRIO_Intake_Tekmir_Send_Autolaunch_V3
subflows.label: PROD BRIO Intake Tekmir Send Autolaunch V3

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Good news! Saddle Rock Legal Group LLC has referred you: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.Name}. Please download/review the details, reply with any questions you may have and provide us with your internal tracking or case number for our records to confirm appropriate receipt of this referral.


Referral Details

Name: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.Name}

Case Type: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name}

Mobile Phone #: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Mobile__c}

Home Phone #: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Home__c}

Business Phone #: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Work__c}

Email: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Email__c}

State: {!Get_Intake_ID.litify_pm__Case_State__c}

Case Description: {!Get_Intake_ID.litify_pm__Description__c}

Intake Name: {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Primary_Intake__r.Name}

Intake ID (i.e. unique identifier): {!Get_New_Matter.litify_pm__Primary_Intake__c}


Link to files associated with the referral


Any questions?

Contact:

(888) 463-0699

textTemplates.name: SimplyConvertBody
textTemplates.text:
SFDC_SimplyConvert Case Referral,


This is an alert to inform you we just sent a new case referral for {!Get_Intake_ID.Client_Name__c}.


Please reach out to us for any further needs or questions concerning this referral,


Linzee Martin

l.martin@saddlerocklegal.com
